wikitext.*:
{{Expansion}}<!-- Modification: in which order should we list the audiobooks? Isn't it more appropriate to refer to the first year of publication, rather than "the most recent reissue"?  -->
There have been several '''Audiobook''' editions of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s work. Years refer to the most recent reissue.

==''[[The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth, Beorhthelm's Son (radio play)|The Homecoming of Beorhtnoth Beorhrthelm's Son)]]''==
* [[1992]] - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[Christopher Tolkien]], abridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Hobbit]]''==
* [[1974]] - [[Nicol Williamson]], abridged. (published by [[Argo Records]]) [http://open.spotify.com/album/37rEbXuic1u8yw7vqGSgjQ?highlight=spotify:track:6JoDD1SLR60YeQ6L36AN6t Available in Spotify]
* [[2002]] - [[Rob Inglis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])
* [[2007]] - [[Martin Shaw]], abridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]]) ISBN 978-0007106776
* [[2020]] - [[Andy Serkis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]''==
* [[1992]] - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], abridged. (published by [[Caedmon]])
* [[2001]] - [[Rob Inglis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]]) ISBN 0788789813 
* [[2021]] - [[Andy Serkis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Two Towers]]''== 
* 1992 - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], abridged. (published by [[Caedmon]])
* 2002 - [[Rob Inglis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]]) ISBN 078878983X 
* [[2021]] - [[Andy Serkis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Return of the King]]''==
* 1992 - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], abridged. (published by [[Caedmon]])
* 2002 - [[Rob Inglis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]]) ISBN 0788789848 
* [[2021]] - [[Andy Serkis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Silmarillion]]''==
* [[1977]] - ''[[Of Beren and Lúthien]]'', read by [[Christopher Tolkien]]. (published by [[Caedmon]])
* [[1978]] - ''[[Of the Darkening of Valinor]] and [[Of the Flight of the Noldor]]'', read by [[Christopher Tolkien]]. (published by [[Caedmon]])
* [[2002]] - [[Martin Shaw]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])
* [[2023]] - [[Andy Serkis]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]]

==''[[Unfinished Tales]]''==

*[[2000]] - [[Erin Jones]], unabridged. Library of Congress recording.<ref name=Bartch/>
*[[2021]] - [[Timothy West]] and [[Samuel West]], unabridged. (published by HarperCollins)

==''[[The History of Middle-earth]]''==

*2000: [[Patrick Hogan]] (Part One) and [[John Horton]] (Part Two), ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]'', Part [[The Book of Lost Tales Part One|One]] and [[The Book of Lost Tales Part Two|Two]], unabridged. Library of Congress recording.<ref name=Bartch/>

==''[[The Children of Húrin]]''==
* [[2007]]: [[The Children of Húrin (audiobook)|''The Children of Húrin''  (audiobook)]], read by [[Christopher Lee]] and [[Christopher Tolkien]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[Beren and Lúthien]]''==
* [[2020]]: [[Beren and Lúthien (audiobook)|''Beren and Lúthien'' (audiobook)]], read by [[Timothy West]] and [[Samuel West]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Fall of Gondolin]]''==
* [[2019]]: [[The Fall of Gondolin (audiobook)|''The Fall of Gondolin''  (audiobook)]], read by [[Timothy West]] and [[Samuel West]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Fall of Númenor]]''==
* [[2022]]: [[Samuel West]] and [[Brian Sibley]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Legend of Sigurd and Gudrún]]''==
* [[2009]] - [[Brian Cox]], unabridged. (produced by [[HarperCollins]] but never released)<ref name=Bartch>[[Wayne G. Hammond]] and [[Christina Scull]], [https://archive.ph/LkHlN Message #23372], (dated 9 October 2012), at [http://groups.yahoo.com/group/mythsoc/ MythSoc mailing list] (accessed 28 October 2022)</ref>

==''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''==
* [[2024]]: [[Samuel West]], [[Mike Grady]] and [[Chris Smith]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[The Adventures of Tom Bombadil]]''==

* [[2010]] - [[Derek Jacobi]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[Sir Gawain and the Green Knight, Pearl and Sir Orfeo]]''==

*[[1997]]: ''[[Pearl and Sir Orfeo (audiobook)|Pearl and Sir Orfeo]]'', read by Terry Jones.
*[[2007]]: ''Sir Gawain and the Green Knight with Pearl and Sir Orfeo'', read by Terry Jones.

==''[[Letters from Father Christmas]]''==
* [[1998]] - [[Derek Jacobi]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[Smith of Wootton Major]]''/''[[Leaf by Niggle]]''==
* [[2003]] - [[Derek Jacobi]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[Farmer Giles of Ham]]''==
* 2003 - [[Derek Jacobi]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[Roverandom]]''==
* 1998 - [[Derek Jacobi]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])

==''[[Mr. Bliss]]''==

* 2010 - [[Derek Jacobi]], unabridged. (published by [[HarperCollins]])
